analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/30/0x8f01ebcdc9972cf3c7ea61ddf57d124846896db8.sol:
	Contract Sk8coin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/30/0x8f01ebcdc9972cf3c7ea61ddf57d124846896db8.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/30/0x8f01ebcdc9972cf3c7ea61ddf57d124846896db8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/30/0x8f01ebcdc9972cf3c7ea61ddf57d124846896db8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/30/0x8f01ebcdc9972cf3c7ea61ddf57d124846896db8.sol#90) is not in mixedCase
